name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Product Engineer, I excel in delivering robust backend solutions with a focus on AI and API development, leveraging my 8 years of experience in full-stack application building. My technological expertise includes **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and proficiency in cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**. I am adept at creating data pipelines, implementing caching strategies, and optimizing solutions to meet customer-centric demands.

I have successfully led projects integrating AI techniques, particularly in developing LLM and RAG implementations for enhanced real-time data handling. My background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems underpins my approach, as does my commitment to observability and continuous improvement through agile methodologies. With strong problem-solving skills, I thrive in dynamic environments, ensuring that the applications I build not only meet compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 but also deliver value to users and stakeholders.
